title: Direct Dial Widgets Disappearing
content:
I have the Pixel 4a, everything stock running latest Android update. I also use Microsoft Launcher.

I have direct dial widgets (official, from the Google Contacts app) on my homescreen. Every few hours they disappear. I put them all back and even backed up my launcher, yet when they disappear, restoring doesn't return the direct dial widgets.

Simultaneous to them disappearing, I also have a shortcut on my homescreen for the weather in the Google app plus 2 shortcuts in Edge and 1 shortcut in Chrome. All of them also disappear and don't reappear when I restore.

This seems unique to Pixel as I had the exact same set up on previous phones, including Microsoft Launcher, and no issues whatsoever.

Phone isn't rooted.

Any suggestions??
